articles.author: Amit Mudgill
articles.title: Axis Bank Q1 Results: Profit zooms 91% YoY to Rs 4,125 crore, beats estimates - Economic Times
articles.description: Axis Bank Q1 Results: Net interest income (NII) for the quarter rose 21 per cent YoY to Rs 9,384 crore, the private lender said in a BSE filing. Net interest margin (NIM) for the quarter came in at 3.6 per cent, up 14 basis points YoY.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: on Monday reported a 91 per cent year-on-year (YoY) rise in net profit at Rs 4,125.26 crore for the June quarter compared with Rs 2,160.15 crore in the same quarter last year.
